overview: In the Southwest of Colombia, there is a city where salsa dancing exists in a form that is unique in its boldness and energy, yet pure in its tradition and style. Caleños (as the locals of Cali are known) have developed a lightning-fast style of dance called Salsa Caleña that has become an enduring symbol of the people and a culture.
tagline: Discover Colombia’s sensational salsa caleña in an uplifting behind-the-scenes portrait
title: From Heaven is Cali
